title: The Truth About Medical Marijuana
description:
Dr. Leslie Apgar and Gina Dubbé, authors of High Heals: How Two Women Found Their Footing in the Medical Cannabis Industry join Jillian to talk about medical cannabis and its potential to treat women’s health issues. Plus, which type of salt is best for us? And don’t miss Jillian’s last word on intuitive eating!

Guest links: 

GreenHouseWellness.com

Blissiva.com

HighHeals.biz


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
